org.semanticweb.yars.nx

Class NodeComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.semanticweb.yars.nx.NodeComparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Comparator<Node[]>

    public class NodeComparator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<Node[]>, java.io.Serializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NodeComparator.NodeComparatorArgs 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static NodeComparator NC
      Statically accesible NodeComparator which returns true for equals and 0 for compareTo iff arrays contain same elements in same indices and are of the same length
      static NodeComparator NC_VAR
      Statically accessible NodeComparator which returns true for equals and 0 for compareTo if arrays contain same elements in same indices even if they are of different lengths

    • Field Detail

      • NC_VAR

        public static final NodeComparator NC_VAR
        Statically accessible NodeComparator which returns true for equals and 0 for compareTo if arrays contain same elements in same indices even if they are of different lengths

      • NC

        public static final NodeComparator NC
        Statically accesible NodeComparator which returns true for equals and 0 for compareTo iff arrays contain same elements in same indices and are of the same length

    • Constructor Detail

      • NodeComparator

        public NodeComparator(boolean variableLength)
        Parameters:
        variableLength - If true, comparison only performed on the first N elements of the arrays where N is the number of the smaller array

      • NodeComparator

        public NodeComparator(boolean notZero,
              boolean notEqual)
        Parameters:
        notZero - allows duplicates by only using object reference for compareTo method
        notEqual - allows duplicates by only using object reference for equals method

      • NodeComparator

        public NodeComparator(int n)
        Parameters:
        n - Compare and equals only over first n elements of array

      • NodeComparator

        public NodeComparator(int[] order)
        Parameters:
        order - The order in which the comparison should be made. For example, for sorting by POCS order use { 1, 2, 3, 0}. Equals functions operates as normal.

      • NodeComparator

        public NodeComparator()
        Equivalent to NodeComparator(true);

      • NodeComparator

        public NodeComparator(NodeComparator.NodeComparatorArgs nca)
        Constructor with NodeComparatorArgs setup
